name: templ
description: TEMPL - Smart contracts for DAO-governed token-gated access

scripts.slither: solc-select install 0.8.23 && solc-select use 0.8.23 && slither contracts/TEMPL.sol --config-file slither.config.json
scripts.slither:ci: bash -lc 'if command -v slither >/dev/null 2>&1; then (solc-select install 0.8.23 && solc-select use 0.8.23 && slither contracts/TEMPL.sol --config-file slither.config.json) || (echo "[warn] slither skipped due to solc-select incompatibility" && exit 0); else echo "[warn] slither not installed, skipping"; fi'
scripts.test:all: npm test && npm run slither:ci && npm --prefix backend run typecheck && npm --prefix frontend run typecheck && npm --prefix backend test && npm --prefix backend run lint && VITEST_FORCE_CLEAN_EXIT=1 npm --prefix frontend test && npm --prefix frontend run lint && npm --prefix frontend run build && npm --prefix frontend run test:e2e
